name: Ghost Bird of Bewitchment
text:
This card gains the appropriate effect, based on its location in the Main Monster Zone.
â—? Left-most: Gains 1000 ATK/DEF.
â—? Right-most: This card can make up to 2 attacks on monsters during each Battle Phase.
â—? Middle: Cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. Your opponent cannot target this card with card effects.
â—? Other: Monsters in this card's column cannot activate their effects.
